meanings.sent1: The ewe grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The farmer sheared the ewe to collect wool.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lamb played a prank on the ewe.
meanings.sent4: The ewe stood as regal as a queen in the flock.
meanings.sent5: The newborn lamb nuzzled against its mother ewe.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to a female sheep.
meanings.sent1: The shepherd called out to the ewe to come closer.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled at the playful antics of the ewe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lamb tried to imitate the sound of the ewe.
meanings.sent4: The white fleece of the ewe shone like freshly fallen snow.
meanings.sent5: The gentle bleat of the ewe echoed across the pasture.
